hero.description: Atomik turns ideas into scoped, test-verified tasks and delivers production-ready code through vetted developers — faster, safer, and fully auditable.

agents.title: Meet Your New Workforce
agents.subtitle: A specialized team of AI agents working in concert to ship your vision.
agents.analystQuote: I scan thousands of market signals in seconds so you don't have to guess what features to build.
agents.pmQuote: I turn your messy brain dumps into pristine, developer-ready application specs.
agents.designerQuote: I ensure your UI isn't just functional, but pixel-perfect and accessible by default.
agents.devopsQuote: I handle the plumbing. CI/CD, infrastructure, and deployment are my playground.
agents.qaQuote: I break things before your users do. If there's a bug, I'll find it.
agents.securityQuote: I keep the gates locked. Vulnerabilities don't stand a chance on my watch.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: You get production-ready code that passes your specifications and automated tests. It's not a prototype; it's a merged pull request.
faq.q2: How do you prevent bad work?
faq.a2: We don't rely on reviews. We rely on tests. If the code doesn't pass the provided test suite, the developer doesn't get paid. The system is binary.
faq.a3: Currently we are optimized for modern web stacks: React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and TypeScript. More specific constraints can be defined in your specs.
faq.a4: Most micro-tasks are claimed within minutes and completed within 12 hours. You can parallelize dozens of tasks to build features overnight.
faq.a5: You do. 100%. Code is work-for-hire and ownership transfers upon payment release from escrow.
faq.a6: Payouts are instant upon verified test completion. We handle the escrow and transfer, developers get paid in USD or USDC.

investor.title: Ready to invest?
investor.subtitle: Get access to our investor materials
